COLONIAL THEATRE
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 4

THE WORLD’S GREATEST ENTERTAINER

Eva Tangllay

AND HER OWN COMPANY OF 50

THE EVA TANGUIH COMPANY represents the best

features to be seen in variety in America or Eumpe.
Every act merits ﬁrst place on any variety program.

The term VOLCANIC applies to Miss Tanguay's
organization. Every act is of the fast and swift kind
and the most volcanic act of ali is Miss Tanguay her-

self.
